select count(dr.id) from donation_record dr join alumni a on(dr.alumni_id = a.id) join donation d on(dr.donation_id = d.id) join alumni_foundation af on(d.foundation_id = af.id) where dr.is_delete = 0
and a.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and d.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and d.category = category

select dr.id,a.username,dr.create_time, d.title,d.category,dr.money,dr.thing,dr.desc,af.`name` as foundation from donation_record dr join alumni a on(dr.alumni_id = a.id) join donation d on(dr.donation_id = d.id) join alumni_foundation af on(d.foundation_id = af.id) where dr.is_delete = 0
and a.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and d.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and d.category = category
limit #{current},#{pageSize}
